user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my mom and I want to create a slideshow of popular memes and heartwarming posts to celebrate her special day.

TaskList.description: Fetch the top heartwarming posts from the Reddit tool to gather content for the slideshow.
Fetch all the memes available from the Programming Memes Reddit tool to add humor to the slideshow.
Combine the heartwarming posts and memes into a slideshow format.
